name: Protect Port Poly, pls
description:
Place turrets on the turning rings of the space station Port Poly to defend it against asteroids. Hold out as long as you can.

Kenney Jam 2021 Submission

Theme: Rotation Bugs:
  • you can end up unkillable with -1 health (there is an == 0 instead of an <= 0)
  • the turret firing is not in the physics frames, but rather the regular ones. Which means, if your device doesn't keep up with the 60 FPS, your turrets will stop firing
